#summary How to install source code

= Requirements =
  * PC for compile and run
  * Java compiler (recommandation : 1.6 +)
   * ex> $ apt-get install sun-java6-jdk 
  * ant 
   * ex> $ apt-get install ant

= Install =
In the directory where build.xml is located 
  * $ ./install.sh 

= Run =
In the directory where build.xml is located
  * $ ./run.sh
